document.full_text: london has paddington bear but new york now has a giant yellow teddy bear, a great sculptural masterpiece that could sell for more than $9 million at auction in may, christie's said on saturday.
document.title: giant yellow teddy bear to brighten new york city
lines_and_colors: london has paddington bear but new york now has a giant yellow teddy bear, a great sculptural masterpiece that could sell for more than $9 million at auction in may, christie's said on saturday.
